issue.subject: Add support for WMTS REST encoding
issue.description:
We should add support for WMTS with REST encoding in physical service definition, to use it in the MAP. (I'm not proposing to add proxy features and virtual services here) We currently cannot negotiate with a RESTful only WMTS server*. I would propose to try the restful encoding if the KVP fails. OGC says: 
A capabilities resource shall have a URI of the following form:
{wmtsBaseUrl}/{wmtsVersion}/WMTSCapabilities{formatExtension}
For example: http://wmts.geo.admin.ch/1.0.0/WMTSCapabilities.xml?lang=fr *Note: as far as I know, the XML(KVP), SOAP and REST interfaces are all optional in 1.0.0 WMTS

custom_fields.name: Functional impact
custom_fields.value: Only the negociation function of physical service definition is affected

journals.notes:
Thomas, can you check if Leaflet support WMTS with REST?
Implement this implies that this has to be compatible with all kinds of MAP libraries.
